name: Hexagon Walk
description:
Objective

Reach targets (yellow hexagons) without falling off.

Controls Keyboard
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys.
  • Press R to restart.
Gamepad
  • Move with left joystick.
  • Click right joystick to restart.

Note: WebGL gamepad support might be limited to certain controller/browser setups.
You might need to unplug your controller to use keyboard controls.

Credits
  • Made by Fanfu Shentu and Xiao Liu.
  • Music from Komiku.
Known Issue
  • Without clicking elsewhere after adjusting volume, the volume will change with player movement.
  • Sound is missing when playing on Safari.
  • Sometimes left joystick drifts when playing on Safari.
